alert.note: Alert for Citrus; Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 3:12PM EDT until June 19 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Citrus County in west central Florida... Western Sumter County in central Florida... Central Hernando County in west central Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 312 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Brooksville, or near Brooksville, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brooksville, Nobleton, Lake Lindsey, Istachatta, North Brooksville, South Brooksville and Floral City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
